{{Actor| | type = Monster | name = Peasant | class = Peasant14 | game = Strife | doomednum = 173 | convid = 19 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:StrifeHumanoid|StrifeHumanoid]]→[[Classes:Peasant|Peasant]]→Peasant14
A peasant who wears a dark green tunic. {| border="0" |- !width=7%|Map!!width=14%|Name!!width=76%|Notes |- | MAP06 || {{dw|Weran}} || The Rat King, leader of the mutant {{Class|beggar}}s. Opens a way to the castle for you and gives you parts for a {{Class|FlameThrower|flamethrower}}. Important for the story. |} ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Peasant14 : {{Class|Peasant}} { {{Property|Translation}} 3 }
